sectionOne.title: Meet Your Trainer
sectionOne.shortDescription: Mr. Abhiram, a seasoned Oracle professional with over 14 years of hands-on experience in Trade Compliance and Global Logistics, has successfully led Oracle Global Trade Management (GTM) Cloud implementations for numerous multinational enterprises. His dedication to mentoring and deep subject-matter expertise in Oracle GTM Cloud make him the perfect mentor for aspiring trade and compliance professionals. Committed to producing skilled GTM consultants to meet increasing industry demand, Abhiram empowers learners with practical insights and hands-on training to build impactful careers.

faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Global Trade Management Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Global Trade Management Training covers key modules including Jurisdiction Management, Trade Master Data, Trade Compliance, Trade Transactions, Trade Agreements, Landed Cost, License Management, Customs Management, Declaration Management, and GTI (Global Trade Intelligence). For a complete syllabus, please refer to our detailed course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Training sessions are conducted from Monday to Saturday, with 1-hour live sessions each day. This structure ensures regular engagement and hands-on experience with Oracle Global Trade Management Cloud.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend-only batches. All live sessions are scheduled from Monday to Saturday to maintain consistency in learning.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for self-paced learners. Please note that real-time doubt clarification is not included in this mode.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes! Internship opportunities are offered based on performance in mock evaluations. These provide practical experience with Oracle Global Trade Management Cloud tools and real-world projects.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but youâ€™ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if youâ€™re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offlineâ€”ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single GTM Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, the Oracle Global Trade Management Training is delivered as a comprehensive course package. Individual modules are not offered separately.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete resume building assistance tailored to Oracle Global Trade Management roles, highlighting your training and project experience.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, access to a laptop or desktop is necessary for working with the Oracle Cloud instance during training.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior technical background is required. The course begins with the basics, making it suitable for students and professionals from any field. A basic understanding of supply chain or trade compliance is helpful but not mandatory.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We start from foundational topics and progress to advanced features in Oracle GTM Cloud, ideal for both freshers and experienced professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer full job placement support, including mock interviews, resume optimization, and career guidance. Our network includes top employers hiring for Oracle Transportation and Global Trade Management roles.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle GTM Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support your certification journey by providing sample questions, study tips, and expert mentoring to help you clear Oracle Global Trade Management Cloud certification exams

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, all training recordings will be available for 1 year. Soft-copy materials, including detailed steps and screenshots, are provided for each module.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer module-specific interview questions and conduct mock interview sessions to boost your confidence for real-time GTM and trade compliance job roles.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, 3 months of Oracle Cloud instance access is included, allowing you to gain real-time hands-on experience without any software installation.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, your 1-year membership allows you to attend multiple batches of our Oracle Global Trade Management training at no additional cost.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, after completing the course successfully, you will receive an official Course Completion Certificate in Oracle Global Trade Management Cloud.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No, this is a non-coding focused course. The training is centered on the functional and technical configuration aspects of Oracle GTM Cloud.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer personalized 1-on-1 training sessions on request. Please note that pricing is different from regular group batches.
